messages.content: do you remember who is yash?
Yash is one of the close people you enjoy spending time with, Sir.
I don't have Yash's birthday date, Sir.
why you are calling me sir
You had previously requested me to address you as "Sir", Rohan. I can switch back to addressing you by your name if you prefer.
remember this buithday dates when i ask you :
Please go ahead and tell me the birthday dates you'd like me to remember, Rohan.

1.	1 feb ruchi2.	13 march aisha3.	 23 March emmran 4.	1 march panii5.	12 march tanaji kaka6.	27 march pk7.	26 march mankar8.	11 April sahil sonar9.	4 April abhu daa10.	14 April sumedh 11.	4th april abhu daa12.	25 april tusharr13.	17 may mama mami anniversary...14.	4 june arnav15.	1 june pratik..16.  14 june Manmeet 17.	29june mami18.	15 july shravani19.   15 aug independence day20.	30 aug riddhi21.	17 sept kinu mama22.	17 prajakta 23.	8 sept ashish 24.	11 sept bapu25.	12 sept gaurav 26.	18 sept aditaya handore27.	22 sept shreyuu‚ù§28.  13 oct sejall29.  26 Oct disha30.	6 oct ishu31.	27oct komal32.	8 oct harshal 33.	16 oct nishh34.	6 oct ishu35.	26 oct ishaa36.	18 oct aditya handore37.	2 oct atharva karle 38.	23 oct yash wankhade39.  27 Nov apurva 40.	30 nov sid41.	25 dec kaustubh 42.	14 dec subham Bagul 43.	31 dec sheru44.	16 dec vaibhav godse45.	15 dec vedant
I've taken note of the birthday dates you provided, Rohan. I'll remember them for our conversation.
The birthday dates are now stored in my memory, Rohan. I can recall them whenever you need to ask about a specific person's birthday.
